meanings.sent1: She excelled supremely in her studies, achieving top grades.
meanings.sent2: He loves his family supremely, always putting their needs first.
meanings.sent3: The cat supremely ignored its owner's calls, pretending to be asleep.
meanings.sent4: The athlete supremely pushed himself to the limit during the race.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower grew supremely tall, reaching towards the sky.

meanings.sent1: She sings supremely well, captivating the audience with her voice.
meanings.sent2: He performed the magic trick supremely, leaving everyone amazed.
meanings.sent3: The chef cooked supremely, creating a dish that tasted like heaven.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved supremely across the stage, mesmerizing the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted supremely, capturing the beauty of the landscape.

meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or degree
meanings.sent1: The cake was supremely delicious, with layers of rich chocolate.
meanings.sent2: She wore a supremely elegant gown to the ball, turning heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent3: The movie was supremely entertaining, keeping the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The view from the mountaintop was supremely breathtaking, overlooking the entire valley.
meanings.sent5: The diamond ring sparkled supremely, catching the light with every movement.
